pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: E.I. du Pont de Nemours & Company, Yerkes Plant
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Contains a scrapbook documenting a live broadcast of an installment of Cavalcade of America from Buffalo in 1947. Titled "The Oath," the broadcast was based on the life of Buffalo native Millard Fillmore and starred William Powell. Includes historical photos relating to Fillmore, his family and career as well as contemporary ones of Powell and the live broadcast before a theater audience.
